name: The 7 Doctors
overview: The 7 Doctors (or The Seven Doctors) is a z-machine based text adventure based on The popular BBC Science Fiction series Doctor Who. The original was written by David Burke in 2018. The Commodore 64 version was converted by Scott Breon via a Z-Machine conversion website in 2019. In this game you play the seventh incarnation of The Doctor (Sylvester McCoy). Various enemies have kidnapped and imprisoned your other six previous incarnations, and it's up to you to save each and every one of them, for if you don't your death becomes a fixed point in time.
